About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do...

Your project is in safe hands

I am a young web developer with a interest in technology, travel, travel and physical fitness. My goal of traveling and working at the same time brought me to web developing, through that I gained a interest in website building. I have a udemy course certificate for HTML and CSS, while also working towards learning other languages like javascript and python. Currently I am looking for oppourtunities and projects to grow and practice my web developing skills to transition to a full time job. As of the moment i am a freelance developer and i'm always looking for a challenge.
